Nightlight:

Nightlight followed Rodimus, feeling his arms around her was a=
 bittersweet comfort eventhough he isnt the old ROdimus that she loved most=
, part of him still remains.

After they left the command room and when the=
y were walking in the corritors, she looked at Rodimus and said "What will =
happen now?? Have you made a pact with him? have you planning to bring me h=
ere from the beginning?"
